SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT PI.PURCHASE_NO , P.POST_NO , P.THUMBNAIL_LOADPATH , p.POST_NAME , M.MEM_NICKNAME , GP.GP_MINPEOPLE , GP.GP_PEOPLE , GP.GP_DEADLINE , GP.GP_STATUS FROM PURCHASE_INFO PI JOIN GROUP_PURCHASE GP ON (GP.POST_NO = PI.POST_NO) JOIN POST P ON (P.POST_NO = GP.POST_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NO = P.MEM_NO) WHERE PI.MEM_NO = ? ORDER BY PI.PURCHASE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

, P.THUMBNAIL_LOADPATH , p.POST_NAME , M.MEM_NICKNAME , M.MEM_PHONE MEMPHONE , GP.GP_MINPEOPLE , GP.GP_PEOPLE , GP.GP_DEADLINE , GP.GP_STATUS
, GP.GP_PRICE , GP.GP_DPRICE , GP.GP_DRATE , TRUNC(GP_DEADLINE - SYSDATE) D_DAY
, PO.OPTION_NAME
, SL.SHIPPING_ADDRESS , SL.MEM_PHONE MYPHONE , SL.MEM_USERNAME , SL.SL_STATUS
, M.MEM_NAME , A.ACCOUNT , A.BANK
